artist: Engraver: Richard Earlom; Draftsman: after Claude de Lorraine; Publisher: John Boydell

inscription: LL, in margin below image, lettered: Claude le Lorrain delin\'t. / No. 92. | BC, in margin below image, lettered: Published May 1st 1775 by John Boydell Engraver in Cheapside. / From the Original Drawing, in the Collection of the Duke of Devonshire. | LR, in margin below image, lettered: R. portfolio: From Plate 92 from Liber Veritatis, vol. 1 (London, 1777)
title: Mercury Driving Away the Herds of Admetus
